title: i see the term "Fotm" thrown around like pizza dough
body:
yet its also impossible to climb out of any division?

which is it? Free Or Impossible?

replies.body: FoTM is flavor of the month... Don't know how you got free win out of that...

> [{quoted}](name=CancerBasedGod,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=T8Vv2o8x,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-02-10T21:04:10.801+0000)
>
> FoTM is flavor of the month... Don't know how you got free win out of that...

because wins are just about the only flavor anyone likes here, honestly though i thought the acronym was "freelo" now i feel like an idiot :D

seriously though any "flavor of the month" champion is going to be there 90% of the time because of its increased chance of winning, with the other 10% being majority reworks/new champs.  So, my question still stands.

FoTM usually just means a pro played it recently. (Or maybe it was reworked/buffed/new) The FoTM isn't necessarily easy to win with, for instance right now Ryze is kind of FoTM because a pro player won a game with a good realm warp. That doesn't mean realm warp is good in randoms, as people aren't coordinated enough to monopolize on it.
you're not alone in thinking it meant freelo
FotM means popular; Flavor of the Month.

Being FOTM doesn't not mean it is a means of climbing out or OP, it means it is popular (which doesn't always mean the champion is OP, sometimes they are just a new addition, or had a skin recently, etc).
